类 AutoShowroom

java.lang.Object
AutoShowroom
public class AutoShowroom
extends java.lang.Object
版本:
5.0(week5-bootcamp-version)
作者:
Zixin
另请参阅:
"https://lms.monash.edu/mod/page/view.php?id=8894316"

  • 字段概要

    字段
    修饰符和类型 字段 说明
    private java.util.ArrayList<Buyer> buyerArrayList
    ArrayList for Buyer to contain all vehicles created in the AutoShowroom
    private java.util.ArrayList<Vehicle> vehicleArrayList
    ArrayList for vehicle to contain all vehicles created in the AutoShowroom

  • 构造器概要

    构造器
    构造器 说明
    AutoShowroom()
    Constructor to initialize two arraylist to contain buyers and vehicles

    • getIntegerInput

      public int getIntegerInput​(java.lang.String output, java.util.Scanner scanner)
      A method to prevents input values from being integers
      参数:
      output - it is the hint sentence(what you need input) from console I/O
      scanner - system scanner
      返回:
      int value if it is valid
      抛出:
      java.lang.NumberFormatException - number format exception
